1.text: You open the door in front of you and reveal a dark corridor. You step through. Press any key to continue.

2.text: You walk down the corridor for a few minutes until you reach a fork. You can't tell where either dierction leads.

3.text: You turn left and carry on for a few minutes until you find another door. You open it and... you're outside! It's a beautiful day. Go enjoy it.

4.text: You turn right and carry on for a few minutes. A few minutes turns into a few hours. A few hours turns into the rest of your life. You never escape.
